text:
─Producer-san, there's traffic...
We might have to wait a bit longer.

Oh, right, Luca-chan!
There's a collaboration train running on this line right now──

I can't remember the name off the top of my head,
but it's a blue train with a penguin character!
It might come if we wait here...!

Luca-chan... Where are you going?
Don't you want to see the collaboration train?
I'm not waiting around for that.
